remarks: Express a pair function in maps-to notation.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Jan-2017.)
statement:
fmptpr.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
fmptpr.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. W ) $.
fmptpr.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. X ) $.
fmptpr.4 $e |- ( ph -> D e. Y ) $.
fmptpr.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x = A ) -> E = C ) $.
fmptpr.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x = B ) -> E = D ) $.
fmptpr $p |- ( ph -> { <. A , C >. , <. B , D >. } = ( x e. { A , B } |-> E ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d C x $.
$d D x $.
$d ph x $.
